subtitle: A beautiful French dessert.

method.text: Whisk the egg yolks and sugar together until thick and pale. Whisk in the cornflour and enough vanilla to taste.
Bring the milk to just below the boil. Gradually pour milk onto the egg mixture, whisking constantly until well mixed.
Return to the heat and cook over a gentle heat for 2-3 min or until custard thickens and coats the back of a spoon. Leave to cool slightly.
Divide the custard between serving dishes. Top with the figs and raspberries.

title: Framboises aux figues avec sauce Anglais - Raspberries with figs and custard
